QuestData.Title: Removing the Reinforcements
QuestData.Description: Its not good $p, these smart ogres have got a portal working up there and they are bringing in more ogres from somewhere else.$b$bIt looks like it takes a lot of effort to keep it open though. If you take it down I'm guessing they will be delayed quite a while.
QuestData.RewardText: Good, hopefully they will give up on making a portal here.
